name: skillsbite.com
tag_list: people-skills, elearning, video, profiling, skills-assessment, social-networking, business-skills, life-skills, best-practise-learning, contact-centre-training, customer-service-training, management-training, life-coach, 10-minute-bites, bite-size-learnin
overview:
Skillsbite is the premium, people skills portal.

Skillsbite coaches you how to deal with hundreds of everyday people challenges in work and life. Designed to suit all learning styles, each skillsbite consists of an interactive video, proof of learning, impact assessment and guide.

Current features include a profiling tool and listening skills assessment. New features include learning games, social networking, and work related qualifications.

We have produced 50 videos using an award winning production team. Each skillsbite is written by an expert; life coaches, facilitators, occupational therapists - currently 20 registered and expanding weekly.

Increasing individuals and teams understanding and awareness of people skills to improve their productivity and performance. In business this leads to highly motivated teams, achieving record results, increasing profitability and very satisfied customers. And in life, a sense of wellbeing, confidence, and the ability to build great relationships with partners, children and friends.

How is this achieved today? For the majority itâ€™s not.

Why? 3 primary reasons. Firstly, they donâ€™t know what it is so canâ€™t find it. Secondly, they donâ€™t have the time and thirdly they canâ€™t afford it.

Skillsbite.com removes all these barriers. Skillsbite delivers interactive video learning in a way everyone can understand, in 10 minute bite sized chunks, available at work or home for less than the cost of a cappuccino.
